### Laden der Libraries
```{r libraries, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
library("tidyverse")
library("tidygraph")
```

### Laden der Daten
```{r data}
amazon <- read.table("Data/Amazon0302.txt")
```

### Data Exploration
```{r exploration}
head(amazon)
```

### Data Manipulation
```{r manipulation}
dat <- amazon %>% 
  rename(
    from = V1,
    to = V2
  ) %>% 
  mutate(
    from = from+1,
    to = to+1
  )
```

### Netzfitting
```{r net}
net <- as_tbl_graph(dat)

net
```
